ai-tika-vin02t41:1_0: That’s how to hold a discussion in this way.
ai-tika-vin02t41:1_1: that which is done by those who speak contrary to the Teaching.
ai-tika-vin02t41:1_2: He then asked those questions, but only if they were unrecited.’ Then he asked them,
ai-tika-vin02t41:2_0: Rid of blue color, blue, yellow, red, magenta, and color of gold.
